thread.title: It looked like a million and a half people were watching my speech: Donald Trump goes to war with his own National Park Service after it claims just 250,000 witnessed his inauguration
thread.title_full: It looked like a million and a half people were watching my speech: Donald Trump goes to war with his own National Park Service after it claims just 250,000 witnessed his inauguration

title: It looked like a million and a half people were watching my speech: Donald Trump goes to war with his own National Park Service after it claims just 250,000 witnessed his inauguration
text: It looked like a million and a half people were watching my speech: Donald Trump goes to war with his own National Park Service after it claims just 250,000 witnessed his inauguration Initial estimates were that 900,000 turned out to see Donald Trump sworn in on Friday morning The official figure provided by the National Park Service was just 250,000 Now President Trump is disputing that - saying he believed the figure was as high as 1.5 million Trump, visiting the CIA, blamed the 'dishonest media' for saying there were only 250,000 'They're going to pay a big price,' he said - but National Park Service is already groveling on Twitter anyway All Department of Interior Twitter accounts were ordered to stop posting after National Park issued disparaging comparison with Obama's 2009 inauguration Published: 21:28 GMT, 21 January 2017 | Updated: 21:49 GMT, 21 January 2017 21 shares
